subject: Soccer
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: The Court of Arbitration for Sport has backed Chelsea’s claim that Adrian Mutu, whom it axed for cocaine use, must pay back the transfer fee the London soccer club paid. He says he will appeal to civil courts, threatening the entire system of sporting justice.
